survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Subscription-Based Meal Kit Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers who use subscription-based meal kit services to understand their satisfaction levels, preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use subscription-based meal kit services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity and ease of response.

script.question_text: How often do you use subscription-based meal kit services?

questions.question_text: Which of the following meal kit services have you used? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice responses to allow multiple selections.

script.question_text: Which of the following meal kit services have you used? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What factors influenced your decision to subscribe to a meal kit service?
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture all influencing factors.

script.question_text: What factors influenced your decision to subscribe to a meal kit service?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of meal options offered by your meal kit service?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Weekly', 'Bi-weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction questions to measure intensity of feelings.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of meal options offered by your meal kit service?
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Weekly', 'Bi-weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1

questions.question_text: Please describe any challenges you have faced with your meal kit service.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture detailed feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: Please describe any challenges you have faced with your meal kit service.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your meal kit service to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard Likert scale for measuring likelihood to recommend.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your meal kit service to others?
